api_list.name: getaddressbalance
getblock
api_list.description: Get block with a given block hash.

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description:
If verbosity is true, then returns the block with transactions, otherwise with transaction IDs.

NOTE: If you set `true`, then request may take longer as the block with transactions can be ~1-10MB.
It depends on a number of transactions in the block.

api_list.name: getmempoolentry
api_list.description:
Returns mempool data for given transaction.

Hint: use `/gettransaction` endpoint to get mempool transaction itself.

api_list.name: getaddressutxo
api_list.description: Get unspent transaction outputs (UTXO) of the given address..

api_list.name: getrawmempool
api_list.description:
Returns all transactions in memory pool.

Hint: use `/getmempoolentry` to fetch a specific raw transaction from the mempool or `/gettransaction` to get mempool transaction itself.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset for getting remaining list of transactions

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description: If verbosity is true, then returns list of mempool entries, otherwise a list of mempool entry IDs.

vsize.description: Virtual transaction size as defined in BIP 141. This is different from actual serialized size for witness transactions as witness data is discounted

weight.description: Transaction weight as defined in BIP 141

time.description: Local time transaction entered pool in seconds since 1 Jan 1970 GMT

height.description: Block height when transaction entered pool

descendantcount.description: Number of in-mempool descendant transactions (including this one)

descendantsize.description: Virtual transaction size of in-mempool descendants (including this one)

ancestorcount.description: Number of in-mempool ancestor transactions (including this one)

ancestorsize.description: Virtual transaction size of in-mempool ancestors (including this one)

wtxid.description: Hash of serialized transaction, including witness data (in hex)

depends.description: Unconfirmed transactions used as inputs for this transaction

spentby.description: Unconfirmed transactions spending outputs from this transaction

bip125-replaceable.description: Whether this transaction could be replaced due to BIP125 (replace-by-fee)

unbroadcast.description: Whether this transaction is currently unbroadcast (initial broadcast not yet acknowledged by any peers)

modified.description: Transaction fee with fee deltas used for mining priority in BTC

ancestor.description: Modified fees (see above) of in-mempool ancestors (including this one) in BTC

descendant.description: Modified fees (see above) of in-mempool descendants (including this one) in BTC

api_list.name: getaddressmempooltxs
api_list.description: Get bitcoin address mempool (unconfirmed incoming and outgoing) transactions.

api_list.name: gettransactionout

optional_parameters.name: mempool
optional_parameters.description: If it is set `true`, then it looks in mempool transactions as well, otherwise only confirmed transactions.

spent.description: True if output already spent, otherwise false.

coinbase.description: True if the transaction is coinbase, otherwise false.

time.description: The transaction time expressed in UNIX epoch time.

api_list.name: getbestblock
api_list.description: Get the best (tip) block in the most-work validated chain.

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description:
If verbosity is true, then returns the block with transactions, otherwise with transaction IDs.

NOTE: If you set `true`, then request may take longer as the block with transactions can be ~1-10MB.
It depends on a number of transactions in the block.

api_list.name: getblockheader
getmempooltransaction
api_list.description: Get mempool transaction of the given transaction ID.

hash.description: The transaction hash (differs from txid for witness transactions)

vsize.description: The virtual transaction size (differs from size for witness transactions)

weight.description: The transaction's weight (between vsize * 4 - 3 and vsize * 4)

coinbase.description: An empty string if the transaction is not coinbase
True if the transaction is Coinbase, otherwise false

api_list.name: getmempoolinfo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blockpulsar-bitcoin-aggregated-data.p.rapidapi.com/btc/getmempoolinfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blockpulsar-bitcoin-aggregated-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://blockpulsar-bitcoin-aggregated-data.p.rapidapi.com/btc/getmempoolinfo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blockpulsar-bitcoin-aggregated-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

loaded.description: True if the mempool is fully loaded.

bytes.description: Sum of all virtual transaction sizes as defined in BIP 141. Differs from actual serialized size because witness data is discounted.

usage.description: Total memory usage for the mempool.

max_mempool.description: Maximum memory usage for the mempool.

mempool_min_fee.description: Minimum fee rate in BTC/kB for tx to be accepted. Is the maximum of minrelaytxfee and minimum mempool fee.

min_relay_tx_fee.description: Current minimum relay fee for transactions.

unbroadcast_count.description: Current number of transactions that haven't passed initial broadcast yet.

timestamp.description: The last update in UNIX epoch time.

api_list.name: getaddresstxs
api_list.description:
Get bitcoin address transactions.

Hint: If you want to get current unconfirmed incoming and outgoing mempool trnsactions use the `/btc/getaddressmempooltxs` endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset for getting remaining list of transactions

api_list.name: estimatesmartfee
api_list.description:
Estimates the approximate fee per kilobyte needed for a transaction to begin confirmation within provided target blocks
if possible and return the number of blocks for which the estimate is valid. Uses virtual transaction size as defined
in BIP 141 (witness data is discounted).

NOTE: The fee rate is refreshed every minute.

optional_parameters.name: estimate_mode
optional_parameters.description:
Must be one of: “ECONOMICAL” or “CONSERVATIVE”.
A conservative estimate potentially returns a higher feerate and is more likely to be sufficient
for the desired target, but is not as responsive to short term drops in the prevailing fee market.

blocks.description: Block number where estimate was found.

timestamp.description: The last update in UNIX epoch time.

api_list.name: gettransaction
api_list.description: Get transaction of the given transaction ID.

optional_parameters.name: mempool
optional_parameters.description: If it is set `true`, then it looks in mempool transactions as well, otherwise only confirmed transactions.

api_list.name: getblockbyheight
api_list.description: Get block of the given height.

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description:
If verbosity is true, then returns the block with transactions, otherwise with transaction IDs.

NOTE: If you set `true`, then request may take longer as the block with transactions can be ~1-10MB.
It depends on a number of transactions in the block.
